data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rG-b7yjX3_8Q7kNvgGNaCdD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBVCACva_EbU7mtYr_Mp7nekDQEdOtiBIWHMxyKVNJCYw&oe=6649E31C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=c2_Z8mXlllwQ7kNvgGrBtOr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDwYT7zQkOfyp5agdkPsr9UAURbjGolH11mC_PFWeOcqQ&oe=6649ECA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dkoede4OYQ8Q7kNvgF-53A7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD8-i6xZq6c5jrh5OwG5CwvazkFQimQiyj7d3gMCHOgUw&oe=6649D407)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P7K-_HU5sUMQ7kNvgEC06Sc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDPeiCqdAI6eLPQUy2Khgq7bq8Kk7UZzc0voezc_3_Hgg&oe=6649C6E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O9GjSl2ONd0Q7kNvgGZ_rrj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBKl7WMg1ImG6mZexfhA06ZMPwEYz15km53KSlT9EEEyw&oe=6649F358)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wS7TRgtwr88Q7kNvgGcIEoU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFcRMk91sJdYtWSGMyls9hCuyqbW2skFxizhV9d1yJbQ&oe=6649EFD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bH39R1FomLsQ7kNvgHVwlpd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDbJUUnTmDh576LVNJD-rALdfjoJ2cHL4urV8tMCA48yg&oe=6649D5F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2zKIDRSIg1wQ7kNvgGPEVB7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBjV77imCROGTYKLVPL4wdb2GDCjchJfl2_Dze1-qrYcw&oe=6649C06A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yAk9Na8lCV8Q7kNvgGBFedv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA7HaixC_cW_2g2jcdtP9N2mD-JPHN1jKz-TqhvRqeDyw&oe=6649D417)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QUIHe6jD-58Q7kNvgHoFMD1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYArOdAZPjbhYE7Sueyj9wawlYkQTiNJierqmZ-DGjY_Pg&oe=6649EF8C)
